name: Elitzur The Bomb Exterminator
description:
(OH GOD I JUST REALIZED, I ENDED UP SETTING IT TO RESTRICTED, F*** SORRY SORRY, DUN HURT ME PLS)

Do Read!! Controls: Q- To Switch Quantam Particles(Also resets position) Space- To Switch Quantam States WASD-To Move Around (Probably wise not to use tbh) Mouse to Aim the Beam with. Right Click to Move the Particles. Objective:  Switch Between Quantam Particles, White for detecting and Red for destroying, first check if an the box is safe to destroy by moving the White Particle to the box, if there is a bomb, switch Quantam State, you have to destroy boxes or you is dead, to destroy boxes use Red Particle, you have to destroy boxes or you will die, (idk it's a gamejam nothing makes sense), and if you end up hitting the bomb with Red Particle, boom you dead again. that's basically it, based on Elitzur Bomb Theory on Interaction Free Measurement, do drop your high score below. It will get challenging over time!, have fun!! Also fair warning, game might have bugs, will be fixed if I win this jam.

Dev Notes:-

So this was super painful to make, and will probably be late, ugh damn you IL2CPP. Anyways so this game jam, the theme was really interesting, Quantum Mechanics, A thing I had never heard a head or tail of, only knew that it was for people who were ascended to another level, this opportunity has given me a lot to learn on this topic and though it didn't make much sense at least now I know bits and pieces.
